Class RoleGreetService

Provides functionalities related to greeting users with specific roles in a guild.

RoleGreetService(DbService, DiscordSocketClient, EventHandler)

Initializes a new instance of the RoleGreetService class.

Declaration
public RoleGreetService(DbService db, DiscordSocketClient client, EventHandler eventHandler)
Parameters
Type Name Description
DbService db

The database service for accessing role greet configurations.
DiscordSocketClient client

The Discord socket client to interact with the Discord API.
EventHandler eventHandler

The event handler to subscribe to guild member update events.
